content:
## What is an ArrayList?

An `ArrayList`(#e7e8ea) is used to represent a list.

While the size of a 1D and 2D array cannot be changed, an `ArrayList`(#e7e8ea) allows you to add and remove elements and change its size.

## How do I modify elements in an ArrayList?

The `ArrayList`(#e7e8ea) class has methods to modify its elements.

To add elements to an `ArrayList`(#e7e8ea), you can use the `add()`(#e7e8ea) method. The element you want to add is passed as its argument.

To remove elements from an `ArrayList`(#e7e8ea), you can use the `remove()`(#e7e8ea) method. The index of the element or the element you want to remove is passed as its argument.
